lines.text: I won't take any of it with me.
Guess I'm a little lost. I thought this was the road to Winnoga.
Back a mile and take the other fork.

When I turn this handle the force of the explosion will scatter germs for hundreds of miles. The diseases will spread like wildfire from one end of the country to the other, infecting, crippling, paralysing! Communism will rule the world!
You talk like a crazy man!
That's the conclusion I'd expect from an American government agent!
I am benefitting mankind by ridding the world of all the people that stand in the way of communism!
What are these characters trying to do, drop an iron curtain around Winnoga?
